title: Lack of OCE events
body:
In servers like NA there are tourneys and comps everyday events that all ranks can participate in and give the lowe elo players a feel for the competitive but in oce there seems to almost nothing.

Im wondering if they can be set up or how i would love for say bronze,silver,gold ect only comps  (smurfing not allowed) some way for use lower elo players to join on in the action.

A way for us to play for rewards such as ip boosts and small amounts of rp such as in the NA community comps.

I find it a little disappointing that just because oce is a smaller server that it gets less.

Let me know what you think and if you have suggestions on how we can make these comps happen, would be appreciated if Riot supported .
